meaningMnemonic: This very common food is <kanji>parent</kanji> and <kanji>child</kanji> <kanji>rice bowl</kanji>, aka a <vocabulary>parent and child rice bowl</vocabulary>. The parent is a chicken. The child is an egg. This can also be called <vocabulary>chicken and egg rice bowl</vocabulary>, or simply <vocabulary>oyako-don</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: The reading is 親 and 子 and 丼 combined together.
